name: src/app.js
src/collections/games.js
GamesCollection
description: Games collection class derived from {@link https://ampersandjs.com/docs/#ampersand-rest-collection}

name: src/forms/player-name.js
PlayerNameForm
description: Form view for player name entering see {@link https://github.com/AmpersandJS/ampersand-form-view}

name: src/game_core/ampersand-player.js
AmpersandPlayer
description: AmpersandJS-specific implementation of player. Stores the player data in instance of {@link PlayerModel}

name: constructor
description: Initialized the player with an instance of a class derived from {@link Brush} and optionally with user's data

name: name
description: Returns player name

name: name
description: Sets player's name

name: model
description: Returns AmpersandJS model storing player's data

name: isMyTurn
description: Sets isMyTurn flag

name: isMyTurn
description: Gets isMyTurn flag

name: isWon
description: Sets isWon flag

name: isWon
description: Returns isWon flag

name: isInitialized
description: Returns isInitialized property of {@link PlayerModel}'s instance

name: src/game_core/brush.js
Brush
description:
Class which implemets drawing on a canvas.
It supposed to be used as a base class to for classes that implement drawing of crosses or noughts

name: constructor
description: Initializes the brush with color

name: draw
description: Drawing function that must be implemented in derived class

name: drawLine
description: Draws line on the canvas using animation (can be disabled)

name: color
description: Sets color of the brush

name: color
description: Returns color of the brush

name: src/game_core/cross-brush.js
CrossBrush
description: Draws cross on the canvas

name: draw
description: Draws cross on the canvas' context

params.name: posX
params.description: x coordinate of the cross' center

params.name: posY
params.description: y coordinate of the cross' center

params.name: cellSize
params.description: width (and height, because cells are square) of the cell, where cross will be drawn

name: src/game_core/game-board.js
GameBoard
description:
Implements game board and handles game logic. It design to be framework-independent and has only two dependencies:
jquery and lodash

name: constructor
description: Initializes an instance

name: initGame
description: Resets board matrix to null values, reinits point array and selects the player whose turn is first

name: draw
description: Draws grid, cells and cross-out lines (if somebody won)

params.name: forceRedraw
params.description: if true, then previously drawn cells will be forsed to drawn. Otherwise it drawns only newly clicked cells

name: width
description: Sets width (and height because the board is square) of the board.

name: noughtsPlayer
description: Sets noughts player

name: noughtsPlayer
description: Returns  noughts player

name: crossesPlayer
description: Sets crosses player

name: crossesPlayer
description: Returns  crosses player

name: canvas
description: Set new canvas and reinitializes the gameboard with this canvas

name: _attachClickListener
description: Attaches listener of click event and does move when a player clicks on the cell

name: _initCanvas
description: Initializes canvas and reads canvas 2d context

name: _initPointsArrays
description:
Initializes arrays that store points for each user. There are separate arrays for rows, columns and diagonals.
For example, if there are 3 crosses on the 1st row, then this._rowPoints[0].crosses will be se to 3

name: _setNextPlayersTurn
description: Selects the player whose turn is first. If game just started, then the player is selected randomly

name: _crossOutIfWon
description:
Checks col, row and diags points arrays and crosses out col, row or diag if there is a winner.
Player wins if there are 3 points for one of the rows, cols or diags

params.name: useAnimation
params.description: enables or disables animation when cross-out line is being drawn

name: _crossOutRow
description: Crosses out a row and sets winner.isWon to true

params.name: rowIndex
params.description: index of the row to be crossed out

name: _crossOutCol
description: Crosses out a column and sets winner.isWon to true

params.name: colIndex
params.description: index of the row to be crossed out

name: _crossOutDiagonal
description: Crosses out a diagonal and sets winner.isWon to true.

params.name: diagIndex
params.description: index of the row to be crossed out. 0 - top-left to bottom-right. 1 - bottom-left to top-right

name: _indecesToCoordinates
description: Translates row and column index into coordinates on canvas

name: _drawCrossOutLine
description: Draws cross-out line

name: _doMove
description:
Writes current player to corresponding cell of boardMatrix (if the cell is empty), updates point arrays, draws the board
and select the next player at the end

params.name: clickedCell
params.description: coordinated of the cell where player clicked

name: _drawGrid
description: Drawns game boards's grid

name: _getNextPlayerName
description: Returns either 'noughts' or 'crosses'. If game is just started, then the player is selected randomly

name: _translateMousePosToCellCoordinates
description: Translates coordinates of mouse on the canvas to cells row and col indeces

name: src/game_core/nought-brush.js
NoughtBrush
description: Brush to draw noughts on the game canvas' context

name: draw
description: Draws nought in the center of given cell

params.name: cellPosX
params.description: X position of top left corner of the cell

params.name: cellPosY
params.description: Y position of top left corner of the cell

params.name: cellSize
params.description: cell's width (or height, because cell is supposed to be square)

name: src/game_core/player.js
Player
description:
Base player class which provides interface that is used by {@link GameBoard}.
It supposed to be used as a base class to create framework-specific implementation

name: constructor
description: Initialized the player with an instance of a class derived from {@link Brush}

name: brush
description: Returns player's brush

name: name
description: Returns player name

name: name
description: Sets player's name

name: isMyTurn
description: Sets isMyTurn flag

name: isMyTurn
description: Gets isMyTurn flag

name: isWon
description: Sets isWon flag

name: isWon
description: Returns isWon flag

name: isInitialized
description: Returns isInitialized. Must be overriden by derived class

name: brushColor
description: Sets color of player's brush

name: brushColor
description: Returns color of player's brush

name: src/models/game.js
GameModel
description: Model that stores game data (players and finished/unfinished state) See {@link https://ampersandjs.com/docs/#ampersand-model}

name: src/models/player.js
PlayerModel
description: Model to store player's data. See {@link https://ampersandjs.com/docs/#ampersand-model}

name: src/pages/home.js
HomePageView
description: Home page view. See {@link https://ampersandjs.com/docs/#ampersand-view}

name: src/pages/past-games.js
PastGamesView
description: Paste games (leaderboard) page view. See {@link https://ampersandjs.com/docs/#ampersand-view}

name: src/router.js
src/templates.js
src/views/finished-game.js
FinishedGameView
description: View of finished game item. Used to render collection

name: src/views/main.js
MainView
description:
This app view is responsible for rendering all content that goes into
It's initted right away and renders itself on DOM ready.

name: src/views/user-panel.js
UserPanelView
description: Displays users panel. See {@link https://ampersandjs.com/docs/#ampersand-view}
